data.name: Tales of Raetrethra - Legends of the Past: Chapter 1
data.detailed_description:
"Tarkhan. Until your memories return, that is your name.”

About The Game:
‘Tales of Raetrethra - Legends of the Past’ is a collection of chapters featuring a man who awakens in the desert with no recollection of his memories. Not even his own name.

In addition to the Prologue, Chapter 1 continues the journey of our nameless protagonist under the care of Etse and her granddaughters, Nali and Rulie. It also follows Niyue as she struggles to fulfill her duties in an unfamiliar land.

Features:
- 10 hours of storytelling
- 60000+ words
- 10+ characters
- 50+ backgrounds
- 40+ evocative soundtracks
- 100+ immersive sound effects
- 42 unlockable gallery items
- 68 unlockable glossary pages
- Gorgeous, distinctive hand-drawn art
- Touching, detailed, realistic narrative

Meet The Cast:






Warning: This game may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised.

data.short_description: ‘Tales of Raetrethra - Legends of the Past’ is the story of an amnesiac man who awakens in an unfamiliar world. Follow his adventures in discovering this rich and mysterious new world, the diverse people he meets, his efforts to remember the past, and his struggles to save the future.

fullgame.name: Tales of Raetrethra - Legends of the Past

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Dual-Core CPU or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Four-Core CPU or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
